setTransparency.description: Sets the transparency of a graphics resource
setTransparency.title: Animation program, setTransparency command

___time.description: Time to reach target transparency [ms]. No anim if 0 (zero)

___alpha.description: The target transparency. A floating point number in the range [0.0, 1.0]. 0.0: Opaque; 1.0: Transparent.

___subject.description: The subject (e.g. an image resource) we set the transparency of

moveTo.description: Moves a graphics resource to a given (x, y) position in the viewport. (0, 0) is on the viewport's top left corner.
moveTo.title: Animation program, moveTo command

___time.description: Time to reach target coordinate [ms]. No anim if 0 (zero)

___subject.description: The subject (e.g. an image resource) we move

program.description: A program describing an animation run
program.title: Animation program

items.description: A particular step within the program

___args.description: A map of arguments for the command

___resources.description: The resources used by this program

___images.description: A list of image resources to load

___key.description: The unique ID of this image

___targetLayer.description: The ID of the layer in the view port onto which to draw this image

___uri.description: The location where to find this image
